title: We gotta talk about Wukong | Why Wukong needs to be changed... | Upcoming Wu Nerfs | Outdated Kit

embed.description: In this video i will be talking about the upcoming Wukong nerf and why Riot is doing a big mistake with that | Like' if you enjoyed & want MORE ðŸ’™ â–º Help me reach 4000 Subs!

body:
Yo guys what is going on,

its ya boy king to the kong back at the mic and i welcome you to this video. In this video i will be talking about the upcoming Wukong nerf and why Riot is doing a big mistake with that. I will go through all his Abilities, including the passive and that will actually show everyone, who watches this video, that the nerf is completely senseless. And i hope Riot will see this and finally start to change something about Wukong.
